com.centimia.orm.jaqu
Interface CRUDInterceptor<K>

public interface CRUDInterceptor<K>

Implementations of this interface are used for intercepting CRUD operations on Entities Entity. It can also be used with POJOs.
In order to use this interceptor you must mark your bean with the @interceptor Interceptor annotation.

Since:
2.0.0
Author:
shai
